snippet.title: Solo: an introspective puzzle adventure - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
“Solo is an introspective puzzler set on a gorgeous and surreal archipelago. Reflect on your loving relationships by exploring contemplative, dream-like islands.”

NOW AVAILABLE: http://store.steampowered.com/app/591750/Solo/
https://www.humblebundle.com/store/solo
https://www.gog.com/game/solo

https://twitter.com/TeamGotham_
https://www.facebook.com/TeamGotham
